dmca.title: Notification of Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: David Mytton [mailto:david@olate.co.uk] 
Sent: Wednesday, March 01, 2006 10:49 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Notification of Infringement

Hello,

A website which appears to be hosted on The Planet network has been
identified as infringing the copyright in the layout and design of one of
our PHP software products. The owner of the website was e-mailed (to
support@christianblog.com) on 15th Feb 06 at 21:53 GMT with the following
message, but no response has been received.

*************
It has been brought to our attention that the design you are using for your
bug tracker at http://www.christianblog.com/bugs/ is based on the original
design that we have created for our issue tracking product, Arctic. You can
compare your design and layout with that of our product from our demo at
http://www.olate.co.uk/products/arctic/demo/index.php

The Arctic design and layout is not public domain and as such your use of
our original work is in breach of international copyright law. As such, we
kindly request that you immediately remove the our copyrighted work from
your website.

Please reply to this message to confirm your compliance within 24 hours
otherwise we will be forced to forward the complaint to your hosting
company.
*************

Since no reply has been received, I am forced to notify you of this
infringement. According to a reverse lookup on the domain name,
christianblog.com, the IP that the domain name points to (67.18.103.132) is
owned by ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

As per http://www.theplanet.com/legal/copyright.html here is the information
required in the notification:

1. I certify that as the Managing Director of Olate Ltd I am authorised to
act on behalf of Olate Ltd, the copyright holder.

2. The infringement is of the design originally created and available to
view at http://www.olate.co.uk/products/arctic/demo/index.php and copied &
altered at http://www.christianblog.com/bugs, particularly with reference to
the design/layout of the view bugs page as can be seen at
http://www.olate.co.uk/products/arctic/demo/index.php?cmd=view&id=3 and
copied & altered at http://www.christianblog.com/bugs/view/020

3. See #2

4. The only contact information available for christianblog.com is the
e-mail address support@christianblog.com. However, the website appears to be
owned and operated by 4CM Network and John B Abela. The 4CM Network website
is http://www.4cm.com and at http://www.4cm.com/contact.php a postal address
is provided:

4CM Network
P.O. Box 3206
Eureka, California
95501-3206 USA

All domains are registered through "Domains by Proxy, Inc." and hence do not
provide any contact information.

5. We have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner
complained of above is not authorised by the copyright owner, its agent, or
the law

6. The information in this notification is accurate, and under penalty of
perjury, I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right
that is allegedly infringed
--
Regards,

David Mytton
Managing Director - Olate Ltd
http://www.olate.co.uk

T: (646) 257 3714 (USA) T: (020) 7870 9176 (UK)
F: (0870) 705 2104 (UK) E: support@olate.co.uk
